itemDescription: British actor, writer and theatre director

wikipedia_page.main: Richard Crawford is a British theatre director and actor known for the Secret Theatre Project. His productions are typically site specific and immersive. He is credited for introducing immersive theatrical productions to Hong Kong and Singapore.

response: * Richard Crawford (music historian), American music historian
* Richard Crawford (director), British theatre director and actor
* Richard Crawford (American football) (born 1990), American football cornerback
* Richard Crawford (sport shooter) (born 1934), American Olympic sport shooter
